channel.title: A mentally retarded man eats pretty much anything
channel.description:
These people normally would have been ignored all their lives being called freaks, but now the internet is here so they can reach out to their real fans.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ijk-hweDRRw&feature=relmfu
Other things I watched him eat: a whole tub of vaseline, a load of nutmeg + 1 liter of vodka, a childrens book, 12 raw eggs etc etc
http://www.youtube.com/user/shoenice22

reminds me of myself
[/quote]

this completely proves the mentally retarded statement.[/quote]well, you kinda handed that one to her on a silver platter, spank…

item.title: A mentally retarded man eats pretty much anything
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Brolapse, post:8, topic:430575”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=533251.msg3898106#msg3898106 date=1327511244]
@lemme_winks_, yep, that is the one. I saw it on TruTV.

You shouldn’t enforce this behavior. He might die just to entertain others, while he has no idea what’s going on.

It certainly looks like he knows what is going on. Who said he is mentally retarded anyway? He doesn’t look like it to me. Plenty of perfectly normal people do really dumb things for attention, how is this different?
[/quote]
From watching quite a few videos it’s quite obvious he is mentally ill. He talks like a mentally ill person does.[/quote]
Such as? I’ve seen the two posted in this thread and I didn’t come to this conclusion.

Read full topic
